name: The Block Pro
title: Current Trends In Ethereum Blobspace
text:
Synopsis
Ethereum's Dencun upgrade introduced proto-danksharding (EIP-4844), creating a separate fee market for blobspace, while the broader crypto ecosystem shows increasing consolidation and strategic chain migrations.

Key Insights
- Ethereum implemented proto-danksharding (EIP-4844) in March 2024, establishing an independent fee market for blobspace
- Solana has become a prominent platform for memecoin trading, particularly through Pump.fun's token launchpad protocol
- Azuki chose to airdrop its ANME token on Arbitrum One instead of Ethereum, likely due to Ethereum's higher transaction costs and lower throughput
- The blockchain sector experienced a significant M&A surge in Q4 2024, with a 57% quarter-over-quarter increase in transaction volume
- The trend suggests ongoing consolidation and strategic repositioning within the crypto industry
